casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Richard W. WILLIAMS 291P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Richard W. Williams, for Williams, Richard W. *532Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of August 2017 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."

Beasley, J. and Morgan, J. recused
